channel.title: [Rate] Website
channel.description:
Well... I am just wondering what all of you think of my new website. It took about 36 minutes to make. Please rate from 1 to 10 (10 being highest).
I R NEED VERIFICATION
Obviously, it is still under construction (none of the links besides forums work), but the layout is finished for the most part.
-Alexia

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

Well I liked it before and its even better now, not amazing but it does the job. It will take seconds to download on the slowest of pcs making it a nice simply yet effective site, well done!

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

usernamelol - good fer it.
S!ms - erm… what?

Anyways… I changed it a little bit now. Also, for those of you who couldn’t figure it out… it was made to match the forums. =O

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

No offense, but it is awful.

For starters, the banner is way too simple. The text in a banner should always “pop” out to the eye, making the text instantly readable, etc… I suggest a 1px black border on all of the text, and possibly a 3px drop shadow. That should make it look 10 times better.

Next, the content area is about 790px too wide. The dotted line sucks, the titles are black -make them white-. Makes the rest of the site look even worse.

If you fix both of those up, it should look 0.01 times better.

-S!ms

[/sarcasm]

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Its a test banner… on Elitegfx…

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @regecks1 regecks`
item.description:
@regecks1 wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:4, topic:34899”][quote author=alexia link=topic=50100.msg615153#msg615153 date=1166018335]
Time? Took me 36 minutes.

Could you please give some suggestions of what to add?

-Alexia
[/quote]

What programs do you use for web design?
Do you know how to use photoshop, and are you good with it?

Instead of a plain banner with just text on it, make a cool image that has the text on it. For example, look at Mr.Chris’s website -http://elitegfx.net/. The main page -index page- is appealing to the eye, and seems attractive. You can also tell that elitegfx.net is a graphics community by looking at the banner.[/quote]ibtd.

Simplicity is a very attractive quality for a site. One of the main problems I see is that a lot of your text isn’t centered in it’s respective row/image, either horizontally or vertically. Perhaps a SMALL logo or something in the banner would improve it.

However, with the example of chris’ site. I don’t mean to offend, but that banner is a total eyesore. I can barely read the text, not enough contrast, and it doesn’t fit the rest of the site.

Observe:

[20:21:57] [regex]: http://elitegfx.net/ [20:21:58] [regex]: kamu [20:22:05] [regex]: is the banner on that site a total eyesore? [20:23:27] [Kamu]: it looks crap if that is what you mean
You can also tell that elitegfx.net is a [crap/amateur/poorly made] graphics community by looking at the banner.
fixt. (but not necessarily true)

also, leader u r totly cul lulz

Read full topic

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“alexia, post:3, topic:34899”]Time? Took me 36 minutes.

Could you please give some suggestions of what to add?

-Alexia[/quote]

What programs do you use for web design?
Do you know how to use photoshop, and are you good with it?

Instead of a plain banner with just text on it, make a cool image that has the text on it. For example, look at Mr.Chris’s website -http://elitegfx.net/. The main page -index page- is appealing to the eye, and seems attractive. You can also tell that elitegfx.net is a graphics community by looking at the banner.

item.title: [Rate] Website
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

I’m sorry to say, but I don’t like it. 1/10…sorry. The reason why - I think it looks really simple, and plain. I know you spent time working on it, but try to make it a little better.
